data.name: Secured Fixed Personal Loan
data.description: Our secured loan offering to provide you with lower interest rates with your car as a security for the loan

features.additionalInfo: Get a lower interest rate : By offering your car as security for the loan, you can access a lower rate than our unsecured personal loan.
Preferred repayment frequency: Choose to make weekly, fortnightly or monthly repayments to suit when you get paid.
Choose the loan type to suit you :Choose between a fixed rate, which gives you set repayments for the life of the loan, or a variable rate which allows you more flexibility.
Internet banking access : Manage your loan and track your repayments online or through your mobile banking app.
Internet and Phone banking : Includes the Security, Stopping or altering payments, Scheduled transactions and payments , Other transactions and payments, Faults and service difficulties

eligibility.additionalInfo: Should be aged 18 years or over

eligibility.additionalValue: You have permanent residency in Australia/NZ  or You're a non-resident or migrant and hold an acceptable Visa, with a minimum 1 year before expiry

eligibility.additionalInfo: You have a fixed, verifiable residential address in Australia.
You have a regular, verifiable Australian taxable income

fees.name: Lending Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Lending establishment fee (added to your loan amount). Excludes all government charges such as stamp duty, search fees, fees to register security interest with the Personal Property Securities Register

fees.name: Loan discharge fee - Within 12 Months
fees.additionalInfo: Loan discharge fee if you fully repay the loan within the first 12 months

fees.name: Loan discharge fees - After 12 Months
fees.additionalInfo: Loan discharge fees if you fully repay the loan after the first 12 months and before the end of the loan term

fees.name: Overseas Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The fee is Nil ($0) for cash withdrawals from Global ATM Alliance and Westpac Group partner ATMs. To find an overseas ATM visit the link below

fees.name: Missed Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you an arrears letter relating to an overdue amount.

fees.name: Payment dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a direct debit order for payment from another institution is dishonoured.

fees.name: Safe custody of your title deeds
Copy of withdrawal or deposit form
Processing fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you make any repayment on your loan over the counter in a branch or by cash or cheque

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Maximum Interest rate charged for the product. 1-7 years of flexible loan term.
